item.title: What are Diffusion Models? -- Test
item.description: A beginnerâ€™s guide to diffusion models
item.content:encoded: Diffusion models are a type of generative AI that create data by learning to reverse a process of gradually adding noise, turning random noise into realistic images, audio, or text. They are powerful because they generate high-quality results and are more stable to train than GANs.
